intro.title: Welcome to Avalo
intro.subtitle: Learn how to use the platform

tokens.title: How Tokens Work
tokens.subtitle: Avalo uses tokens as currency. 1 token = 0.20 PLN
tokens.buy_tokens_desc: Purchase token packages on the web (PLN 30-1000)
tokens.earn_tokens_desc: Enable Earn Mode and get paid for chats and calls
tokens.spend_tokens_desc: Use tokens for messages, calls, meetings, and AI chats
tokens.note: Your wallet shows token balance. PLN amounts only on web checkout.

chats.title: Chat Pricing
chats.subtitle: Fair pricing with free messages and transparent fees
chats.free_messages_desc: Every chat starts with 3 free messages per person
chats.deposit_desc: After free messages: 35% platform fee (35 tokens non-refundable)
chats.fees_non_refundable: Platform fees (35%) are non-refundable under all circumstances. Only unused escrow can be refunded.

calendar.title: Calendar Meetings
calendar.subtitle: Book social meetings with safety and transparency
calendar.social_only_desc: Coffee, dinner, public activities. No escort services allowed.
calendar.escrow_explained: 20% platform fee + 80% held in escrow until meeting verified
calendar.verification_desc: GPS, QR code, or selfie to confirm attendance
calendar.refund_policy_desc: Cancel before: full refund. No-show: partial. Late: varies.
calendar.legal_warning: Payment is for TIME ONLY, not services. No escorting, no sex work. Violations result in permanent ban.

ai.title: AI Companions
ai.subtitle: Chat with AI friends - subscription-based, no per-message fees
ai.tier_plus_features: Unlimited messages • All standard AIs • 2 tokens/photo
ai.tier_creator_features: Create custom AIs • Fine-tune responses • Share publicly
ai.revenue_note: 100% Avalo revenue - no revenue sharing with AI creators

safety.title: Your Safety Matters
safety.subtitle: We take safety seriously with multiple protection layers
safety.moderation_desc: AI + human review for inappropriate content
safety.reporting_desc: Report users, messages, or meetings instantly
safety.fraud_detection_desc: Automated systems detect scams and fake profiles
safety.privacy_desc: Encrypted chats, secure storage, GDPR compliant
safety.guidelines_desc: Be respectful. No harassment, hate speech, or illegal activities. Platform fees are non-refundable. Violations result in warnings or bans.
